text: On the 'Manage Preferences' email subscription page. Is it possible to amend the opt out of all text to something more 'professional'?

Under your settings, go into Marketing > Email and click into the Subscriptions tab (direct link is <https://app.HubSpot.com/settings/[[YOUR_PORTAL_ID]]/marketing/email/subscriptions> ). Then click into the "Edit" for your Subscription preferences page.

If it's a drag and drop template, you can click into the "Subscription Preferences" module and edit the options in the sidebar (click "Publish Changes" at the top to set live).

If it's a coded template it should look something like this: `unsubscribe_all_text="No more calls, no more texts - we're breaking up."` and you can edit the text between the quotation marks.
